Package problem01

Class Van

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem01.Vehicle
      • problem01.Van
  • public class Van
extends Vehicle
    CS5004 Spring2022 Jin Young Park hw2 Van.java Van is a child class of Vehicle and inherits the fields from Vehicle class. The maximum occupancy, whether it needs special driver's license, and whether it allows different pickup and dropoff locations are set as constant.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Van

        public Van​(java.lang.Double dailyPrice,
           int numOfBookedDays)
    throws IllegalDailyPriceException,
           IllegalNumberOfDaysException
        Constructor of Van class
        Parameters:
        dailyPrice - - representing the daily price for renting the vehicle, as Double
        numOfBookedDays - - representing the number of days that the vehicle is booked, as Integer
        Throws:
        IllegalDailyPriceException - - If the inputs of the daily price is below 0, then it throws exception since it is invalid input
        IllegalNumberOfDaysException - - If the inputs of the number of days is below 0, then it throws exception since it is invalid input
